title: Large sound and Strong tremors in Bangalore, Earthquake?
content:
Bangalore people have witnessed some kind of weird large sound along with strong tremors mostly like an earthquake. People in a panic have started sharing on Twitter about what they felt. The earthquake-like tremors and sound in Bangalore were felt around 1.25 PM on Wednesday. Check out some of the first reactions on twitter, until we get the exact report.

 

“Bangalore a loud blast! Shook the whole building – @krishnx”

 

 

 

“Eventually many parts in Bangalore heard this loud explosion noise which made door panels vibrate. But no one knows what was it. #Bangalore- @aatheena”

 

“I just felt an earthquake here in Bangalore a few minutes before. Couldn’t confirm it

Any Bangaloorians? Any input ?- @proleta45909334″

 

#What noise was that!!?? Not thunder… It sure felt as though some blast happened or something…. Anyone else heard it #bangalore – @yasodha88″

 

“Felt like furniture dropping in the top floor, and the building shook a bit in an instant. very shock wave kind of feel.

It seems to have hit all of Bangalore. – @_logik”

 

“People living in #Bangalore who heard a loud blast at around 1:25 p.m. It wasn’t an #earthquake it was mostly a fighter jet breaking the sound barrier. Also known as #sonicboom – @adityajossen”

 

“who else felt one-second turmoil and supersonic kind of noise in #bangalore? Heard this noise and lil turmoil felt by multiple places by multiple ppl. Can anyone please explain, what’s that weird noise? – @sourabhsanyal”

 

source: https://gossiper.uk/news/large-sound-and-strong-tremors-in-bangalore-earthquake/
